attributes.title: Not Tiktok Spam
attributes.review: this app is SO bad. i downloaded it to see his campaign plans and had to get a completely new phone because it crashed EVERYTHING. didn’t even set up an account or anything, just downloaded it. don’t get it. he’s also a child sex trafficker so don’t support him.

attributes.title: Worst app ever 🥳
attributes.review: I always thought this app would’ve been so great, because it came from trump and his amazing 🧚‍♀️✨ administration 🥳. But it literally glitches every time I’m about to sign in or create a new account. I can’t even vote for trump because this is the safest way possible 🧚‍♀️✨ I’m in tears and I’m shock 😔🥳

attributes.title: Torched my house on fire 🤬
attributes.review: I couldn’t believe my eyes. I downloaded this app as a joke but it got offended and grabbed my phone and tossed it across my room breaking it. Then it got more angry and decided to light my house on fire. Now I’m homeless and this weird orange guy is calling me names and trying to kick me out of my country. I was born here 😭😭😭

attributes.title: False Expectations
attributes.review: This app is terrible is crashes my phone. Jk I don’t care about this app. Donald J Trump is a disgrace to humanity and an embarrassment to the legacy of the United States of America. “Make America Great” America was never great and the fact that the big orange man in the White House is there just proves my point. He’s a despicable intolerant creature and doesn’t deserve to be in office

attributes.title: UNEXCEPTIONABLE GLITCHES
attributes.review: So while I was using this app and as soon as I opened it, my phone crashed. I don’t get why this happened but it shut down my phone for a week and I had to pay 200 bucks just to get it fixed. Apparently the whole motherboard was fried along with the processor. DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL CRASH YOUR PHONE.

attributes.title: xue hua piao piao bei feng xiao xiao
attributes.review: Honestly, I’m disgusted with the sight of this app. Every time I opened it, I felt the disturbing urge to regurgitate. I couldn’t even get past the sign in page without having to run to the bathroom. I feel as though this type of app SHOULD NOT be allowed in the app store and should be taken off immediately.

attributes.title: Racist?
attributes.review: upon opening this app, there was a screen that demanded to know my skin color, as i slid the bar to one of the darker browns, it immediately proceeded to shut down. now when i try to open it i’m greeted with a glowing text saying “white power” and i’m unable to interact with the app, truly horrifying.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.review: this app is spam. i opened up the app just to see the ugly soggy waffle looking, beat-up, dumb, piece of crap. THIS IS SUCH A DUMB APP!!! he supports homophobia🤢, racism🤮, transphobia😵, and much more. lovely. just lovely☺️🧚‍♂️✨💫💗🦋. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡, this is so dumb. if i could rate this 0 stars i would, sweetie. if you see this, make a 1 star review please. coz this man is stupid. and a dumb cheeto. -kimora🥺💗💫🧚‍♂️🦋

attributes.title: Tik tok
attributes.review: If you delete Tik tok there’s nothing I can do and if there’s nothing to do then life is just gonna be boring again and I don’t want to watch movies I wanna watch Tik tok and I found a taco in front of the app and I saw an orange also when I open the app and it said something about Mexicans and I got really offended

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP IT IS A HOTSPOT FOR CHILD PORN
attributes.review: I was all ready to well and truly support our orange president but after I created an account a link popped up and took me to a very scandalous and very much illegal porn site. I closed this window because I don’t want to get into any trouble but this app must not stay in the market. Best wank of my life tho.
